content: p7 p2tog p1 turn row 3 sl1 k8 ssk k1 turn row 4 sl1 p9 p2tog p1 turn repeat row 3 and 4 working 1 stitch more each row until all stitches have been used up sole stitches should now equal 28 32 36 stitches leg recommence knitting in the round working over all stitches until leg measures 1½ /4cm less than total required length cuff work k2 p2 rib for 1½ /4cm or until cuff measures desired length cast off loosely i use jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind off http //www knitty com/issuefall09/featjssbo php weave in ends & block photograph courtesy of laura stevenson ©chork n drum 2017 this pattern must not be copied or distributed ©chork n drum 2017 this pattern must not be copied or distributed
